text: While we work to contain coronavirus, we have cause for greater alarm when it comes to our national security. Pres. Trump could have mitigated Covid-19's threat; We don't know what other threats he's failed to pay attention to. | @sam_vinograd, @CNNOpinion https://t.co/bB2KZL80Xp
